defs: = ಕಲಪರಟಿ.
a collection of materials, accumulated for some purpose (as building materials for construction of a house).
a collection of materials rejected and thrown away as worthless; rubbish.
(dial.) a dye used to blacken the hairs.
a small mortar and pestle of metal or stone, used to pound areca nut or to powder medicine.
a moveable cupboard or ward-robe.
a long, narrow, open container of wood, stone, etc. for holding water or food for animals; a trough.
noise; unpleasant sounds.
adulteration - a) a mixing of inferior, impure, not genuine subtances with another material (usu. being sold); b) an adulterated substance, commodity.
a young elephant.
a young camel.
(in gen.) a young of any animal.
rice in the husk, the seed of the aquatic cereal grass Oryza sativa of Poaceae family; paddy.
the paddy-field.
the tree Stereospermum personatum (= S. chelonoides) of Bignoniaceae family.
unpleasant or uneasy feeling in the mind, caused by anxiety, fear, disappointment, etc.
any of various writing instruments; a pen.
a device having bristles, hairs fastened into a hard back, with a handle attached, used for painting; a brush.
a characteristic way of painting with a brush.
the act or process of inserting a bud or shoot of a plant into the stem or trunk of another for purpose of grafting; graft.
a numbered paragraph of a writing, a law, etc.; a section.
a small wooden stand for pen and ink bottle; an inkstand; a standish.
melodious sounds; pleasant voice.

that which has a sweet sound; the Indian cuckoo (a long-tailed songbird of the family Cuculidae, which has a characteristic two or three-note call and deposits its eggs in the nests of crows which rear the young as their own).
any of several large usu. grey and white birds of the family Columbidae, often domesticated and bred and trained to carry messages etc.; a dove; a pigeon.
a fertilised mature female germ cell in the very early stage of developing into a new member.
= ಕಲಲ.
the study of fertility, development foetus, etc.
the condition of being deteriorated or useless; deterioration; a wasting away; spoilt condition.
the condition between deep sleep and being wake-up state.
the apparent perception of sights, sounds, etc. that are not actually present; wrong perception; illusion.
a talking or muttering in sleep.
a telling the same thing, a talking about the same subject repeatedly in a boring manner.
to speak, mutter in sleep.
melodious sounds; pleasant voice.
a woman with pleasing voice.
any small finchlike bird of the family Ploceidae, with brown and grey plumage Passer domesticus; a house sparrow.
the lotus flower.
a water jar.
a small water vessel with a small mouth, used in worshipping and other auspicious occasions, as asymbol of the universe (or cosmic waters) and its generative power.
an ornamental metal cover for the peak structure of a temple, temple-chariot, etc.
a person who is the pride of a society or community.
a round, ball-shaped, female-breast.
a woman whose breasts are round and ball-shaped.
a woman carrying small water vessels on auspicious or religious occaions.
a worshipping of a small water vessel or vessels before commencing an auspicious or religious occaions.
a solemnly placing of a small water vessel, filled with water, before commencing any auspicious or some relgious occasions.
(fig.) that which adds grace, pride or excellence.
(palm.) a particular shape of lines (resembling a vessel) in the palm which is supposed to be a mark of intelligence, renown, etc.
to put an ornamental metal dome-like structure on the top.
(fig.) to add grace, excellence or pride.
= ಕಲಶಪ್ರತಿಷ್ಠೆ.
= ಕಲಶಾಭಿಷೇಕ.
a solemn bathing of a person with holy waters.
a small water vessel.
the plant Hemionitis cordifolia of Polypodiaceae family.
water kept in a vessel with a small mouth for using in auspicious occasions.
= ಕಲಶ.
cooked rice mixed with liquid food.
boild rice mixed with dry spices.
to put or blend together in a single mass; to mix; to mingle (different things) together.
a blend of different things; a mixture.
= ಕಲಸನ್ನ -1.
= ಕಲಸನ್ನ -1.
= ಕಲಸನ್ನ -1.
utter confusion.
the condition that is causing it.
a spicy liquid vegetable food.
a chaotic mixture or situation.
= ಕಲಸನ್ನ -1.
a violent contention or altercation between individuals or with others; a quarrel.
a prolonged fight between large organised armed forces; a battle.
a petty quarrel with verbal abuses.
a dishonest artifice or trick.
a case for a sword; a sheath.
the act or impact of beating, kicking.
to cotend violently with another; to quarrel.
to fight; to wage a war.
= ಕಲಹಂಸೆ.
(Mus.) one of the 108 rhythmic measures in Karnāṭaka system.
(mus.) a mode, in Karnāṭaka system, derived from the main mode Yāgapriya.
any of an order (Phoenicopteriformes) of large, tropical birds with long, red legs, webbed feet, long necks, downward-curving, red beaks, and bright pink or red feathers; a kind of flamingo.
a man inclined or ready to quarrel.
a man who arouse passion or desire for fighting between two or among many people.
a turbulent, quarrelsome woman.
a woman who incites people to fight.
a person who provokes strong passion for fighting.
one who draws another for a quarrel.
a man who provokes strong passion for fighting.
a woman who provokes strong passion for fighting.
a turbulent, quarrelsome woman.
the course and consequence of a war.
= ಕಲಹಡಿ.
a woman who was born in the Karahaḍa country.
= ಕಲಹಲಂಪಟ.
= ಕಲಹಲಂಪಟೆ.
a man who enjoys fighting or quarrelling; he who is desirous of participating in a quarrel or war.
a woman who enjoys fighting or quarrelling.
a woman separated from her lover in consequence of a quarrel with him and regreting later.
a man who wants to fight.
a man whose essential character is engaging in a quarrel or inciting other for it.
(myth.) Nārada, who is believed to be of this nature.
= ಕಲಹಾಶನ.
to incite, urge to fight.
a man engaged in a quarrel or fight.
a woman engaged in a quarrel or fight.
money paid at a fixed rate for the use of money taken on loan; interest.
(astrol.) the centre of any of the sixty digits.
collectively, fine arts.
having something (that adds grace) as a digit (a phase) of the moon.
clever; intelligent.
graceful; elegant.
= ಕಲಾಕುಶಲ.
= ಕಲಾಕುಶಲೆ.
the moon.
= ಕಲಾವಿದ.
(masc.) an expert in any of the fine arts.
(fem.) an expert in any of the fine arts.
fine and intricate art-work.
= ಕಲಾಕುಸುರಿ.
a product of art as a painting, sculpture, literary piece, musical piece, etc.
= ಕಲಾಭಿಜ್ಞ.
= ಕಲಾಭಿಜ್ಞೆ.
artistic quality, ability or work; artistry.
= ಕಲಾಕೌಶಲ.
an artist depending for living on his or her art.
artistic - a) done skillfully and tastefully; aesthetically satisfying; b) keenly sensitive to aesthetic values.
the quality of aesthetically satisfying or being keenly to sensitive to aesthetic values.
a man working in gold and silver, making esp. ornaments.
= ಕಲಾದ.
one of the āgamas.
an expert judge in matters of taste for aesthetics.
the moon.
an eagle or any of various other birds that eat snakes.
the brahminic kite, a kite with white-neck.
a banner having the figure of brahminic kite.
Viṣṇu, who has such a banner.
Brahma, the source of the universe.
an expert man in any of the fine arts.
the moon, who has sixten digits.
a person who has expert knowledge in artistic quality, ability or work and keen discrimination in art, a connoisseur.
collectively, fine arts.
(mus.) a mode, in Karnāṭaka system, derived from the main mode Kharaharapriya.
a man having taste for aesthetics.
a woman having taste for aesthetics.
a violent movement within a group of a people or against the government, management, etc.; an upheaval; commotion.
a group of people, animals or things; a multitude; a bundle.
a peaock's tail feather.
a case for arrows; a quiver.
an ornamental metal belt worn around the waist by a woman; a sash.
(in gen.) any ornament.
the moon.
name of a town or village in which Viṣṇu is believed to be incarnating at the end of the current era.
a slender, straight missile with a pointed end shot from a bow; an arrow.
a thing, matter to be dealt with at a meating, usu. listed in an agenda.
(a list of) programme of things to be done (in a meating); an agenda.
= ಕಲಾಭಿಜ್ಞ.
a group of people; a multitude.
a poetical composition having only four stanzas, but giving a complete sense.
= ಕಲಾಪತಿಧರ.
the moon.
the digits of the moon.
Śiva, who has worn the moon on his head.
= ಕಲಾಬತು.
a bundle or a garland of the feathers of a peacock's tail.
a male peafowl, having brilliant plumage and a tail (with eyelike markings) that can be expanded and displayed like a fan; a pea-cock.
the Indian cuckoo.
a woman well decorated.
the Indian fig tree, Ficus benghlensis.
Lord Śaṇmukha, who rides on a pea-cock.
a female pea-fowl.
a man who has expert knowledge in any of the fine arts.
a woman who has expert knowledge in any of the fine arts.
the golden or silver threads woven into a sari, dhōti, etc.
= ಕಲಾಬತು.
a man who has expert knowledge in artistic quality, ability or work and keen discrimination in art; a connoisseur.
a woman who has expert knowledge in artistic quality, ability or work and keen discrimination in art; a connoisseur.
a person who sincerely loves an art or arts.
the moon.
any of various writing instruments; a pen.
a device having bristles, hairs fastened into a hard back, with a handle attached, used for painting; a brush.
the annual, tendril-climbing plant Pisum arvense of Papilionaceae family.
its pea; garden pea.
= ಕಲಾಯಿ.
= ಕಲಾಯಿಗಾರ.
a tin coating given to the inside of culinary vessels to avoid food turning verdigris.
(fig.) a shaving of the head completely.
= ಕಲಾಯಿಗಾರ.
a man who undertakes, usu. as a profession, coating of tin to the culinary vessels.
a box for keeping culinary vessals.
(masc.) a person who manufactures or sells toddy, liquor, etc.
a man well-versed in any of the fine arts.
he who has taken up any of the fine arts as a means of earning his livelihood.
the aesthitic taste.
(fig.) the quality of doing anything skillfully and tastefully.
= ಕಲಾವಂತಿಕೆ.
= ಕಲಾವತಿ - 1.
a woman who engages in promiscuous sexual activity for pay; a prostitute.
a woman who works in or is skilled in the techniques of, any of the fine arts, esp. in painting, drawing, sculpture, drama, etc.
one of the Śakti (cosmic energy) goddesses.
the vīṇe (Indian lute) of the celestial musician, Tumburu.
(mus.) a mode, in Karnāṭaka system, derived from the main mode Cakravāka.
(mus.) another mode derived from the main mode Yāgapriya.
principles of creative subjects such as painting, sculpture, architecture, music, literature, drama, the dance, etc.; arts.
2) principles of subjects such as philosophy, history, socialogy and the other humanities; arts.
3) systematic study and analysis of any of these art subjects; arts.

a man who - a) works in or is skilled in the techniques of, any of the fine arts, esp. in music, painting, drawing, sculpture, etc.; b) does anything very well, with imagination and a feeling for form, effect, etc.; an artist.

a woman who - a) works in or is skilled in the techniques of, any of the fine arts, esp. in music, painting, drawing, sculpture, etc.; b) does anything very well, with imagination and a feeling for form, effect, etc.; an artist.
a man one who critically analyses or evaluates an art-work, musical performance, dance, drama etc.; an art-critique.
a woman one who critically analyses or evaluates an art-work, musical performance, dance, drama etc.; an art-critique.
a person who engages in some art for the pleasure of it rather than for money; a non-professional artist; an amateur.
= ಕಲಾವಿದ.
the study or theory of beauty and of the psychological responses to it; aesthetis.
the study of any of the fine-arts.
the end of anything; finish.
the condition of being used up completely.
the final cessation of vital functions in an organism; the ending of life; death.
a worker of inferior rank, employed as a seaman; a khalasi.
a servant in military, employed for erecting camps, maintaining them, etc.
collectively, the workforce employed as seamen; ship's company.
having no taste for art or aesthetics.
not embellished; having no grace; dull.
a man having no taste for art or aesthetics.
he who is not embellished or having no grace.
want of taste for art or aesthetics; lack of quality or qualities of imagination, artistic nature.
the dullness; absence of grace (as on one's face).
a woman having no taste for art or aesthetics.
she who is not embellished or having no grace.
to gain knowledge of or skill in, by study, experience or being taught; to learn.

ಕಲಿತ ಕೈ ಕದ್ದಲ್ಲದೆ ಬಿಡದು kalita kai kaddallade biḍadu it is difficult to get rid of bad habits; bad habits die hard; ಕಲಿತದ್ದು ಬಿಡಲಾರೆ, ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಂಡ ಗಂಡನ್ನಾದರೂ ಬಿಟ್ಟೇನು kalitaddu biḍalāre, kaṭṭikoṇḍa gaṇḍannādarū biṭṭēnu bad habits are extremely unwilling to give in.

a valiant soldier; a man with resolute, determined mind.
the tree Terminalia bellirica (=T. bellerica) of Combretaceae family.

anything of inferior quality.
